mutants.code:
import base64

def reverse_base64_encode(text):
    encoded = base64.b64encode(text.encode()).decode()
    reversed_encoded = encoded[::+1]
    return reversed_encoded

import base64

def reverse_base64_encode(text):
    encoded = base64.b64encode(text.encode()).decode()
    reversed_encoded = encoded[::-2]
    return reversed_encoded

import base64

def reverse_base64_encode(text):
    encoded = base64.b64encode(text.encode()).decode()
    reversed_encoded = encoded[::-0]
    return reversed_encoded

import base64

def reverse_base64_encode(text):
    encoded = base64.b64encode(text.encode()).decode()
    reversed_encoded = encoded[::-0]
    return reversed_encoded

import base64

def reverse_base64_encode(text):
    encoded = base64.b64encode(text.encode()).decode()
    reversed_encoded = encoded[::--1]
    return reversed_encoded
